channel.title: Help Please PHP

item.title: Help Please PHP
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

First you could start off with keeping your stuff in one thread.

Fixed it, it took me a while but I got it. Now, I just need to find out how to search by rank. Any ideas? [code=php]function OverallHiscore()
{
include “mysql.php”;
if(!$top_hiscore) { $top_hiscore = “101”; }
echo ’





Rank


Name


Level


XP

'; 
	$per_page = 22;
	$from_where="FROM skillsoverall WHERE lvl > '1'";
	$sql = "SELECT count(*) ".$from_where;
	$res = mysql_query($sql) or trigger_error(mysql_error()." in ".$sql);
	$row = mysql_fetch_row($res);
	$total_rows = $row[0];


	if (isset($_GET['page'])) $CUR_PAGE = intval($_GET['page']); else $CUR_PAGE=1;
	$start = abs(($CUR_PAGE-1)*$per_page);

	$sql = "SELECT * $from_where ORDER BY lvl DESC LIMIT $start,$per_page";
	$res = mysql_query($sql) or trigger_error(mysql_error()." in ".$sql);
	while ($row = @mysql_fetch_array($res)) $DATA[++$start]=$row;

	$uri = strtok($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'],"?")."?";    
	$tmpget = $_GET;
	unset($tmpget['page']);
	if ($tmpget) {
		$uri .= http_build_query($tmpget)."&";
	}    
	$num_pages= @ceil($total_rows/$per_page);
	for($i=1;$i<=$num_pages;$i++) $PAGES[$i]=$uri.'page='.$i;
		foreach ($DATA as $i => $row)
		{
				
			
            if($i < $top_hiscore) 
			{
				if($_GET['user'] == $row["playerName"])
				{
					if($row["lvl"] > 29)
					{
						echo '
							<a href="'.$website.'/'.$pers.'?user='.$row["playerName"].'" class="tableRow tableRowSelected">
							<span class="rankColumn">
							<span>'.$i.'</span>
							</span>
							<span class="nameColumn">
							<span>'.BBCode($row["playerName"]).'</span>
							</span>
							<span class="levelColumn">
							<span>'.dots($row["lvl"]).'</span>
							</span>
							<span class="xpColumn">
							<span>'.dots($row["xp"]).'</span>
							</span>
							</a>';
					} else if($row["lvl"] < 30)
					{ 
						echo'
							<span class="playerValueLeftColumn notRankedColumn">
							<span>Not Ranked</span>
							</span>';
					}
				} else if($i & 1) 
				{
					if($row["lvl"] > 29)
					{
						echo'
							<a href="'.$website.'/'.$pers.'?user='.$row["playerName"].'" class="tableRow">
							<span class="rankColumn">
							<span>'.$i.'</span>
							</span>
							<span class="nameColumn">
							<span>'.BBCode($row["playerName"]).'</span>
							</span>
							<span class="levelColumn">
							<span>'.dots($row["lvl"]).'</span>
							</span>
							<span class="xpColumn">
							<span>'.dots($row["xp"]).'</span>
							</span>
							</a>';
					}else if($row["lvl"] < 30)
					{ 
						echo'
							<span class="playerValueLeftColumn notRankedColumn">
							<span>Not Ranked</span>
							</span>';
					}
				} else 
				{
					echo'
						<a href="'.$website.'/'.$pers.'?user='.$row["playerName"].'" class="tableRow">
						<span class="rankColumn">
						<span>'.$i.'</span>
						</span>
						<span class="nameColumn">
						<span>'.BBCode($row["playerName"]).'</span>
						</span>
						<span class="levelColumn">
						<span>'.dots($row["lvl"]).'</span>
						</span>
						<span class="xpColumn">
						<span>'.dots($row["xp"]).'</span>
						</span>
						</a>';
            
            
				}
			}
        }
 echo"
	</td>
	</tr>
	</table>";
	
	$next = $CUR_PAGE+1;
	$last = $CUR_PAGE-1;
		echo'
			<div class="hiscoresPagingBottom">
			<div class="searchRank">
			<form class="SearchForm" action="overall.php">
			<input name="category_type" type="hidden" value="0">
			<input name="table" type="hidden" value="0">

			<span class="Label">Search rank:</span>
			<span class="Input">
			<input type="text" name="rank" placeholder="" maxlength="7" size="7" value="'.$i.'" id="rank">
			</span>
			<span class="Input_right"></span>
			<div class="SelectButton">
			<button type="submit" value="submit" name="button">
			<img class="" alt="Search" title="Search" src="http://hiscore.sshiscores.info/images/PageControlSearch.png?0">
			</button>
			<input type="hidden" name="submit" value="submit">
			</div> 
			</form>
			</div>';

if($CUR_PAGE < $num_pages){
echo’









‘;
} else if($CUR_PAGE == $num_pages){
echo’


‘;
}
echo’


Page  of ‘.$num_pages.’

‘;
if($CUR_PAGE > 1)
echo’







‘;
else
echo’

';
}[/code]

@sageofmali wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

First you could start off with keeping your stuff in one thread.

Fixed it, it took me a while but I got it. Now, I just need to find out how to search by rank. Any ideas? [code=php]function OverallHiscore()
{
include “mysql.php”;
if(!$top_hiscore) { $top_hiscore = “101”; }
echo ’





Rank


Name


Level


XP

'; 
	$per_page = 22;
	$from_where="FROM skillsoverall WHERE lvl > '1'";

		foreach ($DATA as $i => $row)
		{

				if($_GET['user'] == $row["playerName"])

					}
				} else if($i & 1)

					{
						echo'
							<a href="'.$website.'/'.$pers.'?user='.$row["playerName"].'" class="tableRow">
							<span class="rankColumn">
							<span>'.$i.'</span>
							</span>
							<span class="nameColumn">
							<span>'.BBCode($row["playerName"]).'</span>
							</span>
							<span class="levelColumn">
							<span>'.dots($row["lvl"]).'</span>
							</span>
							<span class="xpColumn">
							<span>'.dots($row["xp"]).'</span>

					}else if($row["lvl"] < 30)

				} else

						<span class="rankColumn">
						<span>'.$i.'</span>
						</span>
						<span class="nameColumn">
						<span>'.BBCode($row["playerName"]).'</span>
						</span>
						<span class="levelColumn">
						<span>'.dots($row["lvl"]).'</span>
						</span>
						<span class="xpColumn">
						<span>'.dots($row["xp"]).'</span>
						</span>
						</a>';
            
            
				}
			}
        }
 echo"
	</td>
	</tr>
	</table>";
	
	$next = $CUR_PAGE+1;
	$last = $CUR_PAGE-1;
		echo'
			<div class="hiscoresPagingBottom">
			<div class="searchRank">
			<form class="SearchForm" action="overall.php">
			<input name="category_type" type="hidden" value="0">
			<input name="table" type="hidden" value="0">

			<span class="Label">Search rank:</span>

			<input type="text" name="rank" placeholder="" maxlength="7" size="7" value="'.$i.'" id="rank">
